[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Exchange grandly with other players on the bot!

## /ge buy

**Usage**

- `/ge buy item:<string> quantity:<string> price:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to buy. | - |
| `quantity` | `string` | Yes | The quantity of the item to exchange (e.g. 7, 5k, 10m). | - |
| `price` | `string` | Yes | The price to exchange each item at. (e.g. 7, 5k, 10m). | - |

## /ge sell

**Usage**

- `/ge sell item:<string> quantity:<string> price:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to sell. | - |
| `quantity` | `string` | Yes | The quantity of the item to exchange (e.g. 7, 5k, 10m). | - |
| `price` | `string` | Yes | The price to exchange each item at. (e.g. 7, 5k, 10m). | - |

**Usage**

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | `integer` | No | The page you want to view. | - |
